title: A typographic brief
content:
Most design industries set briefs for final year degree students. If you had to set a typographic brief for a student in graphic design, what would it be?  
PS would it be possible for you to name design agencies who are mainly involved with typography and editorial.
author: missgiggles

comments.content:

[http://www.akatre.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015180412/http:/www.akatre.com/ "http://www.akatre.com/")
